info.name: D2L Brightspace Material Design
info.description: Many colleges use D2L Brightspace as a hub to give assignments, grades, notes, etc. I think the site looks ugly, but not anymore! I did some redesigning to make it prettier and in line with Google's Material Design spec.
info.additionalInfo:
The selectors might take some tweaking if your college has a different version. If you want the most Material experience, use colors from Google's color palette. Version 1.3
  • Added highlight color to table headers
Version 1.2
  • Made the accordion navigation cleaner
  • progress bar is less dull
Version 1.1
  • More color customization options
  • Now uses regex for URL to make it easier for you
Version 1.0
  • Initial release.
